Key Match Events: Karl-Anthony Towns had his third 30-10 game, finishing with 31 points, 21 rebounds, and four assists.
Josh Hart finished with a triple-double of 15 points, 14 rebounds, and 12 assists.
The Knicks unleashed an 8-0 run in the fourth quarter to go up by 16 points.
Mikal Bridges sealed the game with a 3-pointer, finishing with 27 points.
OG Anunoby contributed 22 points for the Knicks.
Collin Sexton and Jordan Clarkson led the Jazz with 25 points each.
